profile.textGreeting: This is a Chatbot for Goodreads Search

getStarted.textQuestionTypeSearch: Which do you want to search?

booksList.textInitial: These are the books matched with your choice

suggestBook.textAffirmative: :) This book seems a good option!
suggestBook.textNegative: :( This book seems a bad option!
suggestBook.textNonconclusive: ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ The opinions about this book are very confused

errorMessage.textDefault: An error ocurred and we have been notified and will fix this shortly!
errorMessage.textStartover: Sorry for this! Do you want start over?

notAcceptable.text: Sorry, but now I only accept text and buttons clicks

misunderstood.textGeneral: I don't understand what you say
misunderstood.textLetsTry: Let's try options to search books, ok?

adviceStartOver.text: Oh, I really don't understand you. Let's start over?

tipChoosingSearch.text: I think do you want to search a book, don't you?

tipSearchingBy.text: Oh, wait a moment! I'm searching the books for you, but it may take a little

tipChoosingBook.text: Now, you need to choose a book. So, please, click on one of the books that I listed to you

tipChoosedBook.text: I understand that the wait can be boring, but I need a little more time to finish the search, ok? ;)

tipViewingSuggestion.text: I hope you liked the suggestion :). Now, we can start over if you want. Let's go?
